secondaries.shortDescription: Score 1 point (max 3) if either 1+ enemy unit(s) were destroyed by a CHAOS KNIGHTS model within your deployment zone; 1+ enemy unit(s) destroyed by CHAOS KNIGHT model 3''+ away from any deployment zone; 1+ enemy unit(s) destroyed by a CHAOS KNIGHTS within enemy deployment zone

subObjectives.description: CHAOS KNIGHTS model killed an ennemy unit while being in your deployment zone
CHAOS KNIGHTS model killed an ennemy unit while being in your enemy deployment zone
CHAOS KNIGHTS model killed an ennemy unit while being 3''+ away from any deployment zone

secondaries.shortDescription: At the end of your turn, score up to 4 points. 2 for controlling 1/2+ of the objectives with CHAOS KNIGHTS, 1 if 1/2+ objectives are in Dread range, 1 if ALL objectives are in Dread range

subObjectives.description: You control half of the objectives markers with 1+ CHAOS KNIGHTS within range of the marker
Half of the objectives markers are within Dread range of one of your CHAOS KNIGHT unit
EVERY objective marker on the battlefield are within Dread range of 1+ CHAOS KNIGHTS models

secondaries.shortDescription: Curse objective markers at the end of your moral phase (if no Enemy non-AIRCRAFT unit in range) - Completed at the end of your next Psychic phase

subObjectives.description: Action completed and objective marker is cursed
